flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary:
Solar lights are great applications for a remote application, like your back yard. You can make your own more powerful solar lights using LEDs. 

You can get the gear you need to build the solar kit at www.FutureElectronics.com/hohm
guide.title: For Real Brilliance, Build Your Own Solar LED
